uidu.data-fields.add_field.description.message: Add a custom field to your model

uidu.data-fields.address.description.message: Allow geolocation of your records with Google Maps autocomplete help

uidu.data-fields.appointment.description.message: Allow booking an appointment for this record, based on your of your availabilities

uidu.data-fields.avatar.description.message: Insert a rounded avatar for the record

uidu.data-fields.checkbox.description.message: A single checkbox that can be checked or unchecked.

uidu.data-fields.collection.description.message: A collection is a list of items with one or more fields.

uidu.data-fields.contact.description.message: A contact field represents a person or an organization - a contact

uidu.data-fields.country.description.message: Add a Country select list to your record

uidu.data-fields.cover.description.message: Add a cover image to your record

uidu.data-fields.currency .description.message: Format a number with a currency

uidu.data-fields.date.description.message: Inserisci una data (es: 11/12/2013) o scegline una dal calendario.

uidu.data-fields.files.description.message: Carica immagini, documenti o altri file.

uidu.data-fields.member.description.message: A collaborator field lets you add collaborators to your records. Collaborators can optionally be notified when they're added.

uidu.data-fields.multipleSelect.descript.message: Multiple select allows you to select one or more predefined options listed below.

uidu.data-fields.paymentMethod.descripti.message: Metodo di pagamento (Carta di credito o altri)

uidu.data-fields.rating.description.message: Insert a rating for the column

uidu.data-fields.singleSelect.descriptio.message: Single select allows you to select a single option from predefined options in a dropdown.

uidu.data-fields.text.description.message: A long text field that can span multiple lines.

uidu.data-fields.url.description.message: A valid URL (e.g. airtable.com or https://airtable.com/universe).
